name: Silenthead: Ducks hunt
description:
Silenthead: Ducks hunt is a horror game about hunting Silenthead!
You are plaing by the duck detective who need to find Silenthead and kill that beast.

The game divided in 2 parts:
  • Riding to the Silenthead
    In Riding section player will ride through forest road avoiding obstacles and enemies.
  • Killing Silenthead in 2d action horror tower
    In the Tower part player will play 2d shooter with multiple guns, multiple creepy enemies and a bossfight in each tower.
    The tower is procedurally generated. Player can get materials from enemies and craft ammo and some part for the weapons.

Key features:
  • Scary atmosphere
  • Bossfights with Spooky Monster and Silenthead
  • Multiple guns
  • Creepy enemies
  • Crafting system
